DOC.brief_summary: Using UHR-OCT HD-OCT evaluate early postoperative change patient diagnosis preretinal membrane successfully perform pars-plana vitrectomy membrane peel two different type dye .
DOC.brief_title: UHR-OCT HD-OCT Preretinal Membranes : ICG Versus Membrane Blue
DOC.detailed_description: Surgical procedure perform pars-plana vitrectomy membrane peel without cataract extraction IOL implantation . The type dye randomize . The study design include total tweny case ( 10 case ICG 10 case Membrane blue ) Main outcome measure : UHR-OCT , HD-OCT distance near visual acuity contrast sensitivity amsler grid secondary outcome measure : OCT Stratus 3000 visual field . Clinical examination : preoperative , follow-up examination 1 week , 1 month , 3 month , 6 month 12 month .
DOC.criteria: Preretinal membrane Age 18 85 year Combined surgery possible ( phacoemulsification vitreoretinal procedure ) Agerelated macular degeneration Previous retinal detachment surgery Previous laser treatment
